person.persName: Thomas S. Bocock (Appomattox County, Virginia, attorney and speaker of the Confederate States House of Representatives)

body.p: Appomattox County, Virginia, attorney and speaker of the Confederate States House of Representatives. Father of Ana B. Bocock, Mary Bocock, Charles T. Bocock, and Mary F. Bocock. Married to Sarah P. Bocock c1850. Married to Anna H. Bocock c1860. Graduated from Hampden-Sydney College in 1838 and was admitted to the Virginia state bar in 1840. Member of the Virginia State House delegates from 1842 to 1844. Member of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Virginia from March 11, 1847 to March 3, 1861. Representative in the Confederate States Congress. Speaker of the Confederate States House of Representatives on February 18, 1862.
